sentence.Network_en: Thesolution of collagen-PVA was wet spined with the sodium sulfate as coagulant and collagen-PVA composite fibers were prepared.

sentence.Network_en: Ordinarily, standard ferrous sulfate loses strength with age, due to air oxidation.
sentence.Network_cn: 标准硫酸亚铁盐类由于受到空气的氧化一般会随时间而失去其作用.

sentence.Network_en: The use of calcium sulfate requires an greater capital investment.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用硫酸钙做原料,需要更多的基建投资.
